activities.Description: Explore one of the world's oldest and most famous art museums.
activities.TipsAndRecommendations: Book tickets in advance to avoid long lines.

activities.Activity: Shop at Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II
activities.Description: Browse the world's oldest shopping mall.
activities.TipsAndRecommendations: Try the famous geese statue for good luck!

activities.Description: Experience the romantic canals of Venice.
activities.TipsAndRecommendations: Book a sunset ride for maximum romance!
